1318260.name: HUNKER DOWN
1318260.description:
Hunker Down is an open-world game that is a unique combination of Third-person shooter, survival horror, tower defense, and role-playing games. Play the definitive zombie survival simulator!
How long can you survive a post-apocalyptic world? A land overrun with an infected "zombie" population, where you compete with other survivors for limited resources.

Key Features:

• A vast and open world to explore, with different biomes and environments that each have their own challenges and opportunities for survival.

• A dynamic weather system with Day & Night cycles that dramatically affect the gameplay, such as storms that make it harder to see or find resources, or
extreme heat or cold that can harm
players if they are not properly protected.

• A variety of resources that players can gather and use to craft tools, weapons, and shelter, and to cook food.

• A realistic and challenging survival mechanics, such as the need to find clean water and food, and to manage body temperature and energy levels in order to
stay alive.

• Brutal encounters: With vicious hordes of zombies and a variety of different creatures and enemies that players must face, each with their own unique
behaviors and abilities.

• A robust crafting and building system that allows players to create their own shelters, weapons, and tools, and to customize and improve them over time.
